scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:charting" "cd graph-app; npm start" "cd rich-text-app; npm start" "cd map-app; npm start" "cd search-bar-mfe; npm start" "cd data-grid-mfe; npm start" "cd assets-application; npm start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd charting-app; npm install" "cd graph-app; npm install" "cd rich-text-app; npm install" "cd search-bar-mfe; npm install" "cd map-app; npm install" "cd data-grid-mfe; npm install" "cd assets-application; npm install"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd charting-app; npm build" "cd graph-app; npm build" "cd rich-text-app; npm build" "cd search-bar-mfe; npm build" "cd map-app; npm build" "cd data-grid-mfe; npm build" "cd assets-application; npm build"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd charting-app; npm serve" "cd graph-app; npm serve" "cd rich-text-app; npm serve" "cd search-bar-mfe; npm serve" "cd map-app; npm serve" "cd data-grid-mfe; npm serve" "cd assets-application; npm serve"
